metadata.title: CVE-2019-20051 on Ubuntu 22.04 LTS (jammy) - medium
metadata.description:
A floating-point exception was discovered in PackLinuxElf::elf_hash inp_lx_elf.cpp in UPX 3.95. The vulnerability causes an application crash,which leads to denial of service.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2019-20051` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

upx-ucl - 3.96-2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: upx-ucl package in jammy, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '3.96-2').
